name: The American Story - US History Documentaries

episodes.title: What Was It Like Inside Charles Manson's Crazed Cult? | The Manson Family
episodes.description:
Featuring the first ever in depth interview with the ‘Family's' getaway driver Linda Kasabian, high-end drama reconstructions and rare archive, this feature length film chronicles the final days leading up to the notorious 1969 Tate/La Bianca murders.

Subscribe to The American Story for premium documentaries dedicated to the history of the United States: https://www.youtube.com/@TheAmericanStoryHistory

From the Cold War to 9/11, from the assassination of JFK to the Trump presidency, The American Story sheds light on the untold narratives and hidden secrets that have shaped the United States. From its formation way back in 1776 right up until modern day America, our weekly award-winning documentaries share new perspectives and untold stories from the land of liberty.

📺 Discover the past on History Hit with ad-free exclusive podcasts and documentaries released weekly presented by world-renowned historians Dan Snow, Suzannah Lipscomb, Matt Lewis, and more. Get 50% off your first 3 months with code ABSOLUTEHISTORY 👉 https://access.historyhit.com/
